name: Super Star Slayer: Imploda [Global Game Jam 2017 Project]
name_original: Super Star Slayer: Imploda [Global Game Jam 2017 Project]
description:
Corrupt stars are emitting dark energy into the solar system, and it is up to the Super Star Slayer Imploda to destroy them! Travel through space, avoid solar waves, and reassemble her blade Galaxcalibur so she can claim her rightful place in the universe.

[Currently, plays on Windows only]

Credits:

Team Yurisen

Team Lead, Producer, Developer: Erika Martinez

Developer: Toby Fee

Developer: Ba (TinTin) Nguyen

Artist: Aubrey Lange

Special Thanks: Sionainn
